#summary ajaxStore
#labels free,cms,freecms,java,开源,免费,内容管理系统
= ajaxStore=

<p>
<span style="font-style:italic;font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;font-weight:bold;">从FreeCMS 1.5 开始支持</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">根据参数通过ajax收藏数据。</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>

</p>
</td>
<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;font-weight:bold;">说明</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;font-weight:bold;"></span> 
</p>
</td>
</tr>

<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">obj</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">id</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
</td>
<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">对象id</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"> </span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">必填</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">objtype</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
</td>
<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">对象类型  必填 </span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">info:</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">信息</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">siteid</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
</td>
<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">站点id</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">channelid</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
</td>
<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">栏目id</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">show</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>

<td>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">显示内容，默认为收藏</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>

</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<p>

<p>

<td>
<p>

<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">&lt;script type="text/javascript" src="${contextPath}js/jquery-1.5.1.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span>

<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;font-weight:bold;">示例1</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;font-weight:bold;"></span> 
</p>
<p>
<span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;">收藏信息。</span><span style="font-family:'宋体';font-size:10.5pt;"></span> 
</p>
{{{
　　<@ajaxStore objid="${currInfo.id}" objtype='info' siteid='${site.id}' channelid='${currChannel.id}' ;ajaxStoreHtml>
　　${ajaxStoreHtml}
</@ajaxStore>
}}}
